(Could we just shut up and RP? Please!)





Quickstrike:







Quickstrike looked slowly around the area, darkened by the shade of the 
swamp vegitation. This wasn't his kind of a place. Too damp for his taste. 
Too many little animals scurrying around. If his beast mode could, his skin 
would twitch with his nervousness.

His crimson eyes scanned, now looking for a spot to rest. A place to hide 
under. He crawled over to a dead log to his left, to see if it would make a 
half situable spot to bed down.

Nope. There was no way he could fit under it or inside it. He wasn't that 
skinny, even with his half starved body.

Bad idea. He shouldn't have thought of his stomach. It made him feel worse. 
A combination of starvation and damaged wasn't a good thing. He now lost 
count of how many days he had last had something it eat. The feeling on his 
body made him feel like he wanted to cry out. Now no one was with him. The 
transmetal spider clone had said he would find him a CR chamber, but he 
failed to do so for him. Where in the Inferno was he?

He could provide for himself, but for how long? The damage was terrible, and 
it threatened his life. Seriously.

He took a few strides worth with his many legs, searching the ground for a 
comfortable place. He made two swipes of his large pincher into a soft piece 
of ground, but he then moved on.
